metadata.title: CVE-2023-25516 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer, where an unprivileged user can cause an integer overflow, whichmay lead to information disclosure and denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
